title: Correlated Metrics
description: End to end overview of the systems supporting the "Find Correlated Metrics" feature available from the context menu of timeseries graph in the UI.

query.query_string: "[correlations][start_search] User" "has too many active searches." service:mcnulty-query-py3 -"string_query_structured" $org_id $datacenter

search.query: "Correlations initialisation: a new query has been enqueued" service:mcnulty-query-py3 -"string_query_structured" $org_id $datacenter
"[correlations][start_search] No signal finder jobs for correlations search." service:delancie-correlations -"string_query_structured" $org_id $datacenter
service:delancie-correlations -"string_query_structured" "[correlations][start_search] Failed to start search for" $org_id $datacenter
service:delancie-correlations -"string_query_structured" "[correlations][start_search] Failed to query ref series for" $org_id $datacenter
service:delancie-correlations -"string_query_structured" "[correlations][start_search] Failed to update search status for" $org_id $datacenter

service:delancie-correlations resource_name:(correlations.ApmServiceSourcesFetcher.* OR correlations.IntegrationSourcesFetcher.* OR correlations.DashboardSourcesFetcher.*) status:error $org_id $datacenter

service:delancie-correlations resource_name:(correlations.ApmServiceSourcesFetcher.* OR correlations.IntegrationSourcesFetcher.* OR correlations.DashboardSourcesFetcher.*) status:error $org_id $datacenter

definition.content: "Completed" searches are searches that finished naturally or timed out, and users stayed until the end
From first job creation, to last poll from the frontend, including timeouts
Percentage of delancie jobs that have finished when the search is completed
Searches that are queried from a user that did not start them
Number of sources (groups) and results per completed search
Index of the exploration option (depth) that produced the "best" results, by candidate type
How many correlated groups we find in average for a candidate, using the "best" exploration option
Count of all signals we end up saving, by type

definition.title: Jobs dropped before reaching a delancie worker
